name: Secret Bear Cake Party Game
description:
Hello, this is my first game. I made it with the help of yt and my girlfriend Flora. It's very simple, but it's cute and has a bear and cake. Have fun!

Controls: arrows and space for jump

Art and programming (mostly) by me

Music: "Marsz Krasnoludków" by Krystyna Longchamps-Druszkiewiczowa, performed by me and Flora
